CHAT.comment: Chi is very self-directed and spends a good deal of time using the yellow wand to move magnet balls on the black base. Science talk centers around what objects do or don't stick and does not extend to why the yellow wand makes the balls move. Chi's siblings are in and out of the room , and there is constant talking in the background , maybe in another room. Chi's her youngest sister is present for a good portion of the activity , which causes some distraction. Video does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

u.a: explains activity; tells them it will be for about ten minutes
reminds them she is only focusing on their hands
video begins here
magnets are set up on table; Mot and Chi are seated on either side of the table; black base is full of objects
picks up horseshoe magnet with one hand; moves it toward an the blue arrow magnet which she holds in her other hand
attempts to stand a silver man up on the base
clears objects off the black base
holds up black base
uses yellow wand to pick up two washers , the silver circle , and two magnet balls; they dangle from the yellow wand
holds yellow wand with objects suspended from it in front of Mot
attempts unsuccessfully to stand a silver man on the empty black base
holds up yellow wand again; a silver stick now hangs from the bottom of the other objects which are suspended from the wand
SIS approaches table with a book in hand
SI2 is crying in the background
tries to stand silver men on the black base
uses yellow wand to try and pull a nut off the black base
repeats action
moves yellow wand over nut again; the nut is pulled up so it stands on its side and a silver man that had been stuck to the yellow wand sticks to the top of the nut

g.ga: on top of silver man on nut

u.a: places ball on top of silver man
places silver stick on silver man's hands
SI2 approaches Mot
video camera shuts off
talks to Sis
video starts again
talks to Sis , and SI2 cries loudly
talks to Sis , SI2 , and other children , and SI2 cries loudly

puts the plastic turtle back on the black base
MOT is now holding SI2 who reaches for objects on the table

puts a silver ball in the middle of the black base
begins to move yellow wand over the objects on the black base
clears objects off black base
SI2 tries to put a magnet ball in her mouth
is moving yellow wand over a single ball on the black base which causes the ball to move around the base in a circle
picks up the horseshoe magnet and tries unsuccessfully to stick the plastic teddy bear to it
pushes plastic teddy bear toward Chi
moves yellow wand toward horseshoe magnet
picks up plastic teddy bear and tries unsuccessfully to stick it to the black base
pushes the two checked magnets towards Chi
moves yellow wand over three magnet balls on the black base which causes them to move
holds up black base with one magnet ball on it in one hand and moves yellow wand over it with the other hand
puts another magnet ball on the black base
yellow wand sticks to black base
adds another magnet ball to the black base
adds another magnet ball to the black base
holds horseshoe magnet over blue arrow magnet on the table

hands horseshoe magnet to SI2
murmurs to SI2 , and SI2 babbles

a magnet ball drops onto the floor , and Chi retrieves it
holds yellow wand over the magnet balls and bear on the base; one of the balls sticks to the wand
laughing
takes magnet balls off black base and puts plastic teddy in the middle of the base
taps yellow wand repeatedly on plastic bear
picks up plastic teddy bear and puts it on top of the yellow wand then tips the wand to the side so that the bear falls off and onto the table
puts plastic turtle on the black base
taps plastic turtle with the yellow wand
picks up turtle
puts the blue and white checked magnet on the black base and taps it with the yellow wand
tries to stick the yellow triangle magnet to the side of the black base; it doesn't stay
clears objects off yellow wand
puts coins on top of black base
turns black base on its side and the coins slide off
moves coins off black base and puts them on the table
moves yellow wand over the coins on the table; they don't stick
puts down yellow wand; picks up black base and moves it toward coins; it picks up the yellow wand
puts silver circle on table and moves yellow wand over it
silver circle maybe
lifts yellow wand; silver circle and a magnet ball dangle from it

takes ball from SI2

repeats action
repeats action
